remarks: Given a filter on a domain, produce a filter on the range.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 7-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)
statement:
fbasrn.c $e |- C = ran ( x e. B |-> ( F " x ) ) $.
fbasrn $p |- ( ( B e. ( fBas ` X ) /\ F : X --> Y /\ Y e. V ) -> C e. ( fBas ` Y ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
$d V x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
